DOC.brief_summary: This study will establish that the MK0431 100 mg anhydrous formulation tablets are bioequivalent to the MK0431 100 mg monohydrate final market image (FMI) tablets.
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Bioequivalence of Two Tablet Forms of MK0431 (0431-027)
DOC.criteria: Subject is in good health Female subjects must have a negative pregnancy test Subject is within 30% of ideal body weight Subject does not smoke Subject agrees to follow the study guidelines Subject has a history of any illness that might confound the results of the study or make participation unsafe for the subject Subject has a history of hypoglycemia Subject has a history of any hepatic disease Subject is taking any oral, parenteral, topical or implantable contraceptives
